sessionDetail: Yah clip Session {sessionNumber}, {sessionName}, hamāre {courseName} course se hai.

resourceFeedback.title: Yeh session kaisa aapko kaisa laga?
resourceFeedback.subtitle: Hum aapke is session ke bare mein vichaar jaan na chahte hain. Aapki feedback humare courses ko behtar banane mein madad karti hai.

feedbackTags.relatable: Mein session ko samjh pai aur usse jud pai

resourceFeedback.submissionText: Aapke feedback ko bhejne ke liye dhanyavaad

errors.feedbackTagError: krpaya bhejane se pahale ek reting chunen.
